subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador won the third stage of the Volta of Catalunya, taking the overall lead a day before cycling’s governing body decides whether to challenge a previous decision to clear him of doping.
snippet: Alberto Contador won the third stage of the Volta of Catalunya, taking the overall lead a day before cycling’s governing body decides whether to challenge a previous decision to clear him of doping.
